channel.title: Deep Learning on Theo's lab
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Theo's lab

item.title: Modanet Resources
item.description: This is a short summary of Modanet paper for a fashion item detection using Object Detector. Introduction Understanding fashion even in a single image remains an open problem. DeepFashion dataset are still too coarse to train a good model to localize and segment individual fashion items. ModaNet consisting of 55,176 high-quality, fully-annotated street fashion images on top of the 1 million weakly labeled images in the Paperdoll dataset. For the images that are fully-annotated, we have obtained pixel-level segmentation masks and polygons enclosing individual fashion items.
